TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartExportMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 控件的属性是可以全部导出、部分导出还是无法导出。

span.span: Specifies whether all, some, or none of a control's properties can be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值枚举器可应用于属性来指定要导出 Web 部件控件中的哪些属性。A value from the enumerator can be applied to the property to specify which properties from a Web Parts control can be exported. 默认情况下的属性不能导出控件和控件的属性设置为无。By default, the properties of a control cannot be exported and the control's property is set to None. 若要导出的控件的所有属性，设置到所有的值。To enable exporting all properties for the control, set the value to All. 若要只导出某些属性而不包含敏感数据的属性的导出，请到 NonSensitiveData 设置属性值。To export only certain properties while preventing the export of properties that contain sensitive data, you set the property value to NonSensitiveData. 属性可以标记为敏感通过属性。A property can be marked as sensitive through the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 若要启用你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中包含 Web 部件控件的 Web 应用程序的导出功能，必须将添加到属性``元素内的``部分中的，如以下标记所示。To enable the export feature for a Web application that includes Web Parts controls, in the Web.config file for your application, you must add an attribute to the `` element within the `` section, as in the following markup. > > `` > > `` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，对于导出的代码示例正常工作，您还必须更新 Web.config 文件在备注部分中所示。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file as indicated in the Remarks section. 此示例中的第一个部分包含一个名为控件的代码`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件是自定义控件中的示例部分找到的相同类的概述，只不过它将添加`Personalizable`属性为`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性，以便可导出的属性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it adds a `Personalizable` attribute to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 请注意，特性声明中包含的值`true`为`isSensitive`参数，这意味着该属性标记为敏感数据导出目的。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您的源代码编译为程序集、 将其放在 Web 应用程序，Bin 子文件夹和引用程序集`Register`指令在网页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，在声明性标记属性值设置为 All，这意味着即使属性包含敏感值将被导出。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to All, meaning that even properties with sensitive values will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/exportmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/exportmodevb.aspx#1)] 加载 Web 页在浏览器和上的谓词菜单控件，单击导出谓词，请按照说明导出包含控件的状态和属性数据的说明文件。Load the Web page in a browser, and on the verbs menu of the control, click the export verb and follow the instructions to export a description file containing the control's state and property data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode All = int32(1)

summary.span: Web 部件控件的所有属性都可以导出。

span.span: All of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 无法导出 Web 部件控件的任何属性。

span.span: None of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode NonSensitiveData = int32(2)

summary.span: 仅能导出 Web 部件控件的已定义为非敏感数据的属性。

span.span: Only properties of a Web Parts control that have been defined as non-sensitive can be exported.
